name: Lenzing AG
goal:
Lenzing is a high performance materials company in the Cellulosic fiber business that turns CO2 and sunlight into higly functional, emotional and aesthetic products across the globe.
We, as the leaders in fiber innovation, produce all three generations of Cellulosic fibers -Viscose, Modal and Lyocell, - exactly specified for the need of our customers.
Our brand names are TENCEL(TM), VEOCELL(TM) and LENZING(TM).
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
+Retaliation of US with 100% duty due to EU Hormon Beef import restrictions
+MES-Status China
+FTA negotiations
+Modernisation of Trade Defence Instruments
+Trade for All
+European Emission Trading Scheme,
+REACH,
+R&D-BREFs,
+Ecolabel,
+EU-Single Use Plastic Directive
